Text: Nicely done for a first try.  Although informative, I would like to suggest that you include a IMDB link if one is available.  Too many people upload things here without that link or even a description and expect you to know what it is.  Especially when it comes to applications.  I wonder if you would mind trying to upload this again because it is not downloading for me at all and I really wanted to see this one.  Thank you in advance, keep up the good work!
